backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and resident vitals with access control, allowing users to create, view, and delete their own vitals records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs required for implementing daily vitals UI and backend wiring.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components, utilities, pages, and hooks used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, dark mode values, and base layout styles for the Maui Lane design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application and sets the favicon and title for Maui Lane Care Home.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router, React Query, authentication gating, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication wrapper that initializes Internet Identity and shows a login screen or protected content depending on auth state.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Main app shell providing header, nav, footer, and sign‑out support with automatic logo fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing the Dashboard link with active state styling using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Provides a dialog with extensive form inputs to add a new resident, managing nested physician, responsible person, and medication data with validation.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing an existing resident’s information with validation and support for modifying physician entries.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays a resident’s summary card with actions to view, delete, or toggle resident status and shows basic stats.
Header section for the resident dashboard with a title and button to add a new resident.
Provides dropdown controls to filter residents by room and sort by room, name, or age.
Renders a grid of ResidentCard components or an empty state when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI cards summarizing total, active, and discharged residents.
Tab controls for filtering residents by All, Active, or Discharged status.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for entering and submitting daily vitals with validation and API submission via a query hook.
Displays a list of vitals records with sorting, formatting, oxygen status indicators, and delete support via mutation.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Renders a placeholder card listing missing reference items and linking to a checklist page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, state management, and context for authentication across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines vitals-related React Query hooks for listing, creating, and deleting vitals via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom theme variables for light/dark mode, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main residents dashboard with filtering, sorting, KPIs, and add/delete/toggle resident actions.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data and a helper to return medications for a given resident ID.
Builds mock resident profile data from basic resident info, including derived fields like room, bed, and date of birth.
Contains a list of mock residents with IDs, names, ages, rooms, and status used throughout the app.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions for filtering, sorting, and computing KPIs for resident lists, plus extracting unique room names.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Resident profile page that loads resident data, medications, and vitals, provides editing and printing dialogs, and handles UI actions.
Generates a print‑friendly resident profile report including personal info, insurance details, and medication lists.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Renders a reference‑capture checklist page outlining required screenshots and design details for recreating the UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage integration and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project's current state, including schema version and a detailed list of implemented features and components.
